title: Weve Never Seen This in a Phone! - Legion Duel 2 Teardown!
description: The coolest phone we have taken apart... literally - its got two fans. The Lenovo Legion Duel 2 is one of the most powerful gaming phones of 2021, internally. Structurally not so much. Today its time we see how the fans of the Legion Duel 2 work from the inside! We'll take apart the broken gaming phone to find all of the 8 programable gaming triggers.
